function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of systematic investigation, classification, and comparison of ontology-based solutions and tool support for COVID-19 analytics","Impact":"Ineffective utilization of available technology and solutions for addressing COVID-19 data challenges","Mitigation":"Conduct systematic investigations and comparisons to understand the best approaches for utilizing ontology-based solutions","Technologies":"Data analytics tools, ontology-based software systems","People":"Research communities, software developers, healthcare professionals","Owner":"Research organizations, software development teams, healthcare institutions"},{"Description":"Inadequate exploitation of disaster management infrastructures and smart city frameworks to counter the pandemic","Impact":"Inefficient pandemic management and response due to underutilization of existing infrastructures","Mitigation":"Explore and implement the integration of disaster management infrastructures and smart city frameworks to support pandemic management","Technologies":"Integration platforms, disaster management software, smart city technologies","People":"Administrative stakeholders, disaster management authorities, city planners","Owner":"Government agencies, urban development organizations, disaster management authorities"},{"Description":"Accumulation of an unprecedented amount of data without effective utilization for pandemic management","Impact":"Missed opportunities for data-driven intelligence and insights that could support effective pandemic management","Mitigation":"Develop and implement data-driven intelligence systems to utilize the accumulated data for pandemic management","Technologies":"Big data analytics, artificial intelligence systems, data visualization tools","People":"Public health monitoring organizations, pandemic management teams, data analysts","Owner":"Technology companies, public health organizations, data analytics teams"}]}
